measured_by: International Patient Decision Aids Standards (IPDAS) checklist
justification: "When reviewing the quality of DAs, researchers often make use of a standardized quality checklist developed by the International Patient Decision Aids Standards (IPDAS) Collaboration."
"DAs were first reviewed for the IPDAS criteria, after which they were critically analyzed on a range of CAs… we developed a new checklist" to assess these aspects.
The CA checklist items "were supplemented with items … from the Suitability Assessment of Materials checklist," indicating SAM items were used to gauge suitability.
Screening reliability is reported as "The overall kappa score for inter-rate agreement was strong (κ = .90)," showing agreement was quantified with Cohen’s kappa.
